1700.Description: Some unexpected Multer Error occurred when a user was uploading a picture

1701.Description: Some unexpected FileUploadError occurred when a user was uploading a picture

1702.Description: The AWS s3 access key was invalid when a user was uploading a picture

1703.Description: The AWS s3 key signature did not match when a user was uploading a picture

1704.Description: The AWS s3 bucket could not be found when a user was uploading a picture

1705.Description: Some unexpected error occurred when a user was uploading a picture
When a user was uploading a file, a unique file name could not be found after 5 tries

1600.Description: A user tried to have a verification code resent when they forgot their password but the update to the database failed

1601.Description: A user tried to have a verification code sent as they forgot their password but the update to the database failed

1602.Description: A error occurred sending out a users verification code

1500.Description: A user was trying to add a movie to their watch list but the update to the database failed.  Usually means the association already exists.

1501.Description: A user was trying to remove a movie from their watch list but the update to the database failed

1502.Description: A user was trying to add a movie to their watched list but the udpate to the database failed.  Usually means the association already exists.

1503.Description: A user was trying to remove a movie from their watched list but the update to the database failed

1000.Description: Occurs if res.locals.skipAuthentication is set to true but the type is not.  for updating the users image.  This should just about never occur as res.locals.skipAuthentication is only.  Set to true if updating a users image

1001.Description: A user tried to follow another user but the update to the database failed

1002.Description: A user tried to unfollow another user but the update to the database failed

1004.Description: A user tried to update their information but some unexpected constraint error occurred

1005.Description: A user tried to update their information but some unexpected database failure occurred

1006.Description: A user tried to delete their account but the update to the database failed

1007.Description: Some unexpected constraint error occurred when a user tried to set their picture to null

1008.Description: A user tried to delete their profile picture but the update to the database failed

1009.Description: A user tried to delete their profile picture but some unexpected error occured when removing it from AWS

1010.Description: A user tried to upate their picture but it overwrote another users picture as they have the same file name, thus two users pictures are now wrong

1011.Description: Some unexpected constraint error occured when a user tried to update their picture on the database

1012.Description: Some unexpected error occurred when a user tried to update their picture on the database

1100.Description: A user attempted to create a review but it failed to be created on the database for some reason

1101.Description: Some unexpected foreign key constraint error occurred when a user was updating or creating a review

1102.Description: Some unexpected constraint error occurred when a user was updating or creating a review

1103.Description: Some unexpected error occurred on the database when a user tried to update or create a review

1200.Description: A user tried to delete a review but the update to the database failed

1201.Description: A user tried to like a review post but the update to the database failed

1202.Description: A user tried to remove a like from a review post but the update to the database failed

1203.Description: A user tried to post a comment on a review post but a unknown constraint error occurred

1205.Description: A user tried to update a comment on a review post but the update to the database failed

1206.Description: A user tried to remove a comment from a review post but the update to the database failed

1300.Description: A user was attempting to sign up but some unexpected constraint error occurred

1301.Description: A user was attempting to sign up but the update to the database failed

1302.Description: A user was attempting to sign up but the verification email failed to be sent out

1303.Description: A user tried to have their email verification code resent but the udpate to the database failed

1304.Description: A user attempting to sign up tried to have their verification code resent but the email did not get sent out

1305.Description: When creating a users official account the update to the database failed

1306.Description: When removing a temporary user the update to the database failed

1400.Description: A unexpected error occurred on the server and was caught

1802.Description: Some unexpected unique constraint error occurred
